answers.answer: I have to do it next week to check my kidneys because they think i have PKD, i think it is so gross lol.

question: I have to collect my pee for 24hrs but I have to keep my pee in a container and it has to be in the fridge Lol it's gross because I have to go get it every time I pee. I'm worried later we have people coming over and I'm just scared to gross people out. But I know is for my preeclampsia test so Yea.  Did any of you do this?  How do u make things easier?
title: gross
